translations: 使倾斜（slant 的 ing 形式）

sentences.sentence: The sun was beginning to set and sending deep gold-colored rays slanting under the trees when they parted.
sentences.translation: 太阳开始落山了，金色的光芒斜射进树底。两人就在这时分别了。

sentences.sentence: The line is slanting to the left.
The rain is driving [slanting] in from the south.
